original_text: I will be his father, and he shall be my son: and I will not take my mercy away from him, as I took it from him that was before thee:
korean_text: 나는 그의 아버지가 되고 그는 나의 아들이 되리니 나의 인자를 그에게서 빼앗지 아니하기를 내가 네 전에 있던 자에게서 빼앗음과 같이 하지 아니할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and he shall be my son
and I will not take my mercy away from him
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 나의 긍휼을 그에게서 거두지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: as I took it from him that was before thee
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너 앞에 있던 자에게서 거두었던 것처럼이라
